articles.author: Elliot Smith, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European markets muted as investors await U.S. inflation data, Fed meeting - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were mixed on Tuesday as global investors look ahead to the Federal Reserve policy meeting and the latest U.S. inflation data.
articles.content:
U.K. regular wages grew at an annual 7.3% in November, down from 7.8% the previous month welcome news for the Bank of England ahead of its monetary policy decision on Thursday.
Job vacancies fell on… [+1044 chars]
